sentences.en: A freelance journalist a freelance musician a freelance actor a freelance financier?
sentences.cn: 自由新闻工作者、自由音乐家、自由演员还是自由金融投资家?

sentences.en: Alex and Mikhail were in partnership then: Mikhail handled the creative side; Alex was the financier.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯和米哈伊尔当时是伙伴关系：米哈伊尔负责创新，亚历克斯是财务主管。

sentences.en: Andr é Wallenberg was the financier of Sweden's industrialisation.
sentences.cn: 安德?瓦伦堡是瑞典工业化的融资者.

sentences.en: China, the world's biggest financier, disagrees strongly with this goal.
sentences.cn: 全球最大的债权国——中国 —— 则强烈反对这一目标.

sentences.en: Disgraced financier Bernie Madoff has pled guilty to 11 felony counts.
sentences.cn: 颜面扫地的金融家BernieMadoff已经对11项罪名承认有罪.

sentences.en: Financier to pay the purchase price range ceiling section.
sentences.cn: 资者以发行价格区间上限缴纳申购款.

sentences.en: He is the son of a financier who had been ennobled.
sentences.cn: 他就是被封为贵族的金融家之子。

sentences.en: He was very popular, a distinguished fashion figure as well as financier.
sentences.cn: 他是非常有声望的, 一位杰出的时髦人物和金融家.

sentences.en: In person, he has the air of a philosophy professor rather than a gimlet-eyed financier.
sentences.cn: 索罗斯本人并不像一个目光敏锐的金融家，他更具有哲学教授的气质。

sentences.en: Liu Yan is a famous financier in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 摘要刘晏是唐代著名的理财家.

sentences.en: Oh, now you are a personage - a financier!
sentences.cn: 啊, 现在您成了大人物,成了有钱的富翁了!

sentences.en: One Hungarian financier is quite precise about the date: Friday, March 13.
sentences.cn: 一位匈牙利金融家给出了相当精确的日期: 3月13日,星期五.

sentences.en: Psychologically, would that not enhance Cowperwood's standing as a financier?
sentences.cn: 在心理上是不是会抬高柯帕乌作为一金融家的身价 呢 ?

sentences.en: The bank is controlled by a famous financier.
sentences.cn: 这家银行由一位著名的金融家控制.

sentences.en: The Connells were leading financiers of the Democratic Party in Congress.
sentences.cn: 康奈尔家族是民主党在国会中的主要出资方。

sentences.en: The financier told us not to do business in that way.
sentences.cn: 金融家告诉我们不要再用那种方法做业务.

sentences.en: The great financier and banker all the Wall Street barons who followed.
sentences.cn: 伟大的金融家和银行家,华尔街巨头的鼻祖.

words.tran_cn: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动

trans.tran_cn: 金融家，财政家，资本家，投资家
trans.tran_en: someone who controls or lends large sums of money

trans.tran_cn: 欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动
